meaningMnemonic: Something has <kanji>drift</kanji>ed to the point where it has <kanji>arrive</kanji>d. Where do drifting things arrive? They arrive on shore (as they drift on top of water). That makes this word <vocabulary>drifting ashore</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
